title: 48 hours is this normal?
body: Can a riot support member please respond?  Im just trying to get back into league and haven't received any help retrieving my account.

replies.body: The queue is fairly high today so there may be a bit of a wait.  I'd be happy to look into this for you to check on the status of your ticket, but I was unable to find any with the account you are posting from.  Let me know if you have a ticket number and I'll take a look!

Havent played in a few years, trying to recover my password for my account, but when I try through the website nothing is being sent to my email. Yet I have old emails from them when I bought rp back in 2013
Try posting your problem here or on the forum. Sometimes you can get your help right here.
Thats what i was hoping for at least 24 hours, been about a day after my second ticket.
I always got help within 24 hours. Maybe your email/ticket/forum or whatever you used got lost or wasn't sent. Try sending another one.
